dcterms:description: A dataset created for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in Nepali language, containing sentences collected from daily newspapers from the year 2015-2016. It includes three major classes: Person (PER), Location (LOC), and Organization (ORG), formatted in standard CoNLL-2003 IO format.
dcterms:title: OurNepali Dataset

dcterms:creator: Bal Krishna Bal
dcterms:description: A dataset received from ILPRL lab, following the standard CoNLL-2003 IOB format with POS tags. It was prepared by ILPRL Lab and KEIV Technologies, with some corrections made to the NER tags.
dcterms:title: ILPRL Dataset
